EmailTemplate.name: 30Mar12Web: Boomer Summit.Error Fix
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Webinar Distribution Message Sent in Error
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
It has come to our attention that you may have accidentally received a message stating you did not attend Friday's webinar. There was an error in distribution. We apologize for any inconvenience. You should also have received a second message including the slides and links mentioned in the Webinar.
Thank you again for attending, and for your interest in MBO Partners!
The MBO Marketing Team
